data.subscription_watchdog_interval:
Subscription watchdog-timer interval (seconds, 0 or less to disable).
Reolink's event-subscription is not always reliable. This will check it with this interval, and if subscription got not active - will force-update sensors. The less this value is - the less resources of your HA will be spent. Better to set this value to 0 if your subscription is robust enough.
